data.title: But Paul Scheer, How DID This Get Made?
data.meta_description: Actor and comedian Paul Scheer might not be a household name, but you’ve probably seen his work. He’s been in “The Disaster Artist,” “Veep” and “Fresh Off The Boat” among many other movies and TV shows. And over the years, he’s come to appreciate the absurdity of the industry. So much so that he has a podcast about it. Keep reading...
